BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE PIST_LTC_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.STR_NAME_OF_HOD=?,T.STR_VERIFY_STATUS=?,T.DT_VERIFY_DATE=?,T.STR_REM_FOR_VERIFY=?,T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=?,T.DT_BILL_DATE=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_LTC_SETTLE_DTL SET STR_STATUS=? WHERE STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_LTC_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.NUM_SERVICE_BOOK_UPDATION=?,T.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_HOD=?,T.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_STATUS=?,T.DT_ESTABLISHMENT_DATE=?,T.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_REMARKS=? WHERE T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_LTC_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.NUM_SERVICE_BOOK_UPDATION=?,T.STR_ESTABLISH_APPROVAL_HOD=?,T.STR_ESTABLISH_APPROVAL_STATUS=?,T.STR_ESTABLISH_APPROVAL_DATE=?,T.STR_ESTABLISH_APPROVAL_REMARKS=? WHERE T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
